item.title: Manatee County to draft ordinance creating curfew for teens 16 and younger
item.description: A juvenile curfew would prevent anyone under the age of 17 from being in public after certain hours.

item.description: County officials say there is a plan to fix the berm in Cow Pen Slough that failed.

item.title: Animal Control opens cruelty case after cats found abandoned in a cage
item.description: The cats are undergoing a process to prevent complications associated with severe starvation.

item.title: Zack Samuels ready to take the field and dominate for his senior season after suffering an injury last year
item.description: This week’s ABC7 Athlete of the Week is Zackery “Zack” Samuels. He’s a defensive end going into his senior year with the Cardinal Mooney Cougars.

item.title: Discovering the new beginning of the Atala Butterfly on the Suncoast
item.description: These once extinct butterflies are making a comeback, and the latest butterfly delivery room is the Sarasota Succulent Society

item.title: Sarasota, Bradenton to fire up school zone cameras Monday, the first day of school
item.description: The cameras are active 30 minutes before and 30 minutes after school hours.

item.title: Congressman Vern Buchanan awards 50 law enforcement across the Suncoast
item.description: Congressman Buchanan also spoke on a bill he’s pushing for stricter punishment for those who kill or seriously hurt law enforcement, firefighters, or first responders.

item.title: Day of Giving: Donate School Supplies for Local Teachers and Students on Aug. 7
item.description: It's your chance to help local teachers and make a difference for kids in the upcoming academic year.

item.title: Active shooter reported at Fort Stewart, at least 4 taken to hospital
